root: ^Welcome to the first level, Nigiri. I am Jack, one out of three game masters in this Dimension.
^This world was constructed by a mysterious individual who has captured you and put you in this dimension.
^You are forced to play 3 levels to break free, remember to collect the memory fragment.
^Here in Frozen in Time, your dash possesses the power to momentarily freeze the motion of moving and falling platforms.
^Use this skill to overcome the hazards and challenges.
^Venture forth, Nigiri, and may your skills serve as your compass, guiding you towards the truth that awaits on the path ahead.
